projects.description: Todo list is an app that allows you to track all of your daily activities by setting up activities,editing and removing them
Quiz app is an app that allows you to play a game of answering multiple choice questions and provides your scores at the end
Calculator is an app that allows you to do all basic math calculations
Password Generator is an app that allows you to generate random password with some criteria such as uppercase,lowercase,number,symbols, etc
Quotes Generator is an app that allows you to generate random quotes and you can tweet them.
Recipe app allows you to search any recipe. It is built using React.js and consumes data from the Spoonacular api
Weather app is web app that helps users view the current weather in a particular city that they searched. It is built using React.js and consumes data from the openWeather API
QR code generator is terminal app that helps to create a QR code from the data provided either as image or directly in terminal
Currency converter is app that helps users to convert funds from one currency to another
Text Sentiment Analyzer is an app built with nodejs anf NLP that allows companies to gain an overview of how their customers feel about the brand
Image to text converter is web app that helps to parse the image and extracts texts in it. It then displays the texts in UI so that you can copy them. It uses OCR technology
This is a web app that allows users to translate texts from one language to another. It has support for almost all languages and it uses Google Cloud translate api
This is an app that displays Sudoku board with an option to auto-solve
This is a web application that uses Machine Learning in order to recommend movies based on the movies you liked and the rating you gave it. It uses Flask and a Machine Learning algorithm
